definition: a blemish made by dirt, become vague or indistinct
details:
noun
- a blemish made by dirt
= synonyms: blot
- a disparaging remark
= synonyms: aspersion
- (music) a curved line spanning notes that are to be played legato
verb
- become vague or indistinct
= synonyms: dim
- utter indistinctly
= synonyms: swallow
- speak disparagingly of
= example: speak disparagingly of
- play smoothly or legato
= example: play smoothly or legato
